home.aboutUs: This is a Waseda University official circle, mainly composed of Waseda students, aiming to be the best in the world at iGEM, the international competition for synthetic biology.(一旦カス英語)
home.projects: In the 2024 competition, we won six awards, including TOP10 for university teams. This is the best result ever for Japanese university teams, and we were able to bring back two trophies and one gold medal to Japan.(一旦カス英語)
home.team: In iGEM, we are divided into Wet, Dry, and Human Practice teams. We also have a Wiki team that creates a website for presenting our results, a Video team that creates promotional videos, and an Illustrator team.(一旦カス英語)
home.members: Currently, iGEM - Waseda has 26 members. We have students from various fields.(一旦カス英語)
home.recruitment: iGEM - Waseda recruits new members in spring and winter. Anyone can join regardless of their previous knowledge or experience.(一旦カス英語)
home.donation: Our project is supported by your warm support. iGEM - Waseda is looking for companies and individuals who can support our activities throughout the year.(一旦カス英語)
